remarks: The inverse of a group element expressed in terms of the identity element.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2011.)
statement:
grpinv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpinv.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpinv.u $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
grpinv.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
grpinvid2 $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( N ` X ) = Y <-> ( Y .+ X ) = .0. ) ) $.
